Sentencas: In devices such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), oxygen separators and membrane reactors, the mechanical properties of the ceramic components are particularly important for estimating reliability.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: Here we summarise some recent studies of the mechanical properties of oxygen ion-conducting ceramics for the applications mentioned.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: Young's modulus and Poisson's ratio of several materials of interest for SOFCs have now been characterised; including the effects of temperature and porosity on these parameters.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: The biaxial flexural strength and fracture toughness of tape-cast YSZ have been measured at room temperature and at a typical operating temperature of 900 degreesC. Fracture toughness decreases with increasing temperature; from 1.61+/-0.12 MPa m(0.5) at room temperature to 1.02+/-0.05 MPa m(0.5) at 900 degreesC. Flexural strength and fracture toughness were found to be quantitatively consistent with fracture being initiated at observed surface defects.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: YSZ has also been found to be susceptible to sub-critical crack growth.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: Many oxygen-ion conducting ceramics suffer from a chemically induced stress when subjected to a gradient in the thermodynamic activity of oxygen.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: Ceria and acceptor-doped lanthanum chromite are given as typical examples.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: One strategy for overcoming this problem in electrolytes is to laminate different materials.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: An example is given of CGO laminated with a thin layer of YSZ.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: The combined effects of improved microstructure and residual stress lead to the laminated membranes having higher apparent strength than single layer CGO membranes by a factor of between 1.75 and 4.06.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes

Sentencas: Electrode/electrolyte laminates have been observed to have some unexpected behaviour.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ceramic oxygen ion-conducting membranes
